titleStmt.title: The tryall and condemnation of Mr. John Cooke, sollicitor to the late High-court of injustice. And Mr. Hugh Peters, that carnall prophet, for their several high-treasons, &c. At the Sessions-house in the Old-baily, on Saturday the 13. of October, 1660. Together with, their several pleas, and the answers thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Peters, Hugh, 1598-1660.
England and Wales. Court of Oyer and Terminer and Gaol Delivery (London and Middlesex)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Stafford and Edward Thomas,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
